title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 561.5 - Submission of questions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 561.5 - Submission of questions

State Regulations

To maintain uniformity of accounting, utilities shall
submit questions of doubtful interpretaton to the commission for consideration
and decision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
561.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
